title: Fixed issue where the Connect button wasn't clickable until scanning was complete :tada:
message:
Fixed issue where the Connect button wasn't clickable until scanning was complete :tada:

By not notifying the adapter of updates every single time a
`ScanCallback` gets pinged.

title: Made it so that the list of devices only gets cleared when you click on "Scan for Devices"
message:
Made it so that the list of devices only gets cleared when you click on "Scan for Devices"

Also cleaned up the lambda code to be recursive instead of repetitive

title: Made the file logger _append_ to files instead of overwriting them :bulb:
message: Made the file logger _append_ to files instead of overwriting them :bulb:

title: Fixed file opening so that it doesn't fail when trying to re-create the public documents folder
message: Fixed file opening so that it doesn't fail when trying to re-create the public documents folder

title: Sorted out behaviour of the start / stop logging button, added unbind on activity destruction
message:
Sorted out behaviour of the start / stop logging button, added unbind on activity destruction

* Pressing the start logging button will update the filename textbox
with the actual filename
* Pressing the start logging button will disable / lock the the filename
textbox
* Pressing the stop logging button (same button, reused) will re-eable
the filename textbox

title: Added BTLE connection and RX display. Started work on logging service
message: Added BTLE connection and RX display. Started work on logging service

title: Initial commit
message:
Initial commit

The app is able to list UART BTLE devices nearby, though not yet
interact with them in any way.
